definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: The consensus is that China has a real-estate bubble.
sentences.chinese: 中國的房地產存在着泡沫，這點大家毫無異義。

sentences.english: There are many homonyms, so you have to distinguish.
sentences.chinese: 其中有許多同形異義詞，查檢使用時須加分辨。

sentences.english: And the one thing he is petrified of is genuine political dissent which he cannot control.
sentences.chinese: 唯一讓他喫驚的是他不能控制的真實的政治異義。

sentences.english: This is a kind of research method based upon the primitive"homophonic"relations.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種建立在原始“同音異義”關係上的研究方法。

sentences.english: Two words are homographs if they are spelled the same way but differ in meaning.
sentences.chinese: 拼寫相同意思不同的兩個單詞是同形異義詞。
